item.title: Use the dashboard
item.description: Work with custom rulesets in the dashboardCreate custom rulesets in Application Security > WAF > Custom rulesets. After creating a custom ruleset, you must deploy it to your account to apply its rules. item.title: Use the API
item.description: Work with custom rulesets using the APIUse the Rulesets API to work with custom rulesets using an API. Account-level WAF configuration requires an Enterprise plan with a paid add-on. To deploy a custom ruleset in your account, follow these general steps: Create a custom ruleset, if it does not exist. Deploy the custom ruleset to your account. For more information, refer to Work with custom rulesets in the Ruleset Engine documentation.
